thread.section_title: Flologic Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flologic | flologic.com | 2 of 4
thread.title: No Name Given
thread.title_full: Flologic reviewed by No Name Given

author: No Name Given
title: No Name Given
text:
Very difficult to find plummer willing to install. Only purchased because State Farm theatened to cancel homeowners insurance without install of Flologic. Don't know if it's working, lights are off although connected.
Support next to nothing, Biggest waste of money I was forced to spend to keep homeowners insurance.
If you purchase this product, good luck!
